pain_points.description: Difficulty finding event times on the website.
supporting_quotes: it might be nice to have the time reflected easily so I don't have to open it first to see what time it is
you have to open close your app go to your calendar and see the date
pain_points.frequency_severity: Moderate - mentioned by multiple users with a mild sense of frustration.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users manually open the event details to find the time.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Leads to extra steps and potential confusion when planning attendance.

pain_points.description: Inability to easily find new announcements on the website and app.
supporting_quotes: it would be really great to have both on the app and the website the new things are highlighted in some fashion
you can't find them and that's you just took my just been
pain_points.frequency_severity: Moderate - significant enough to be mentioned multiple times.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users scroll back through the list to find new items.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Time-consuming and frustrating, leading to missed opportunities.

pain_points.description: Issues with the JotForm for sign-ups.
supporting_quotes: my partner does that and she had a lot of trouble with it
pain_points.frequency_severity: Low - mentioned specifically by one user.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users rely on partners or others who are familiar with the tool.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Creates barriers for those unfamiliar with the tool.

pain_points.description: Complexity in handling cancellations and waitlists.
supporting_quotes: extremely time-consuming and then I did it wrong
pain_points.frequency_severity: Moderate - one user had a significant issue.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users rely on others to resolve issues.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Frustration and inefficiency in managing event participation.

pain_points.description: Lack of location details in email reminders for events.
supporting_quotes: it would be nice to have the address in that reminder
pain_points.frequency_severity: Moderate - mentioned by at least two users.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users scramble to find previous emails for addresses.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Causes last-minute stress and confusion before events.

pain_points.description: Overwhelming number of emails related to the club.
supporting_quotes: my email is just swamp with Santa Barbara newcomers club
pain_points.frequency_severity: High - one user expressed significant frustration.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users have to sift through emails to find relevant information.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Leads to missing important emails and feeling overwhelmed.

pain_points.description: Inflexibility of event scheduling for working members.
supporting_quotes: it would be helpful for people who are working because there are activities you cannot do obviously because it's during the day
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users miss events or feel disappointed.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Limits participation and engagement in the community.

pain_points.description: Confusion and errors due to outdated information on the website.
supporting_quotes: the registration on the website was not correct
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users rely on others to confirm information.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Risk of participants going to wrong locations, causing stress.
